reviews.text: I was travelling alone and was lucky enough to find this little gem right in the heart of the old town of in Bilbao. The theme of the B & B is that of Alice and Wonderland, it is fantastic and unusual. The rooms are really lovely. There is a Kitchen where you can use the fridge and microwave. I had been travelling around Spain for a month and this was the best place I stayed. The staff are very friendly and accomodating. It is right in the heart of the old town minutes walk from the metro. If I return to Bilbao which I intend too I wil stay here.
reviews.title: Loved my stay here.

reviews.text: Why is the toilet not separated from the bed in a couple room????
reviews.title: Toillet in the bed

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I am sure with an extra few euros you can put a door there.
reviews.title: Amazing!

reviews.text: Also, croissants in the moorning are better when they were not preapared the day before, just basic stuff that one would expect and yet not provided.
reviews.title: Unique, central and comfortable

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Absolutely the best choise. One of the bests place ever. Cozy rooms, frinedly staff and original design!
reviews.title: Good value central location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is central in the old town with easy access to the Guggenheim, sightseeing, tramway, taxis and railway station. Ensure that you advise of your time of arriveal, we were early which resulted in a delay in getting into the buidling, but this was our own fault. Once inside we were provided with a detailed description of the best places to visit, locations, restaurants etc.
reviews.title: Perfectly good

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here for 1 night in July 2011.
reviews.title: Good stay overall - avoid Bilbao on Sundays

reviews.text: Room: spacious bedroom & bathroom. No covered wardrobe to hang clothes - just a rod but plenty of room/hangers. Other reviewers mentioned there were no doors to the bathroom - honestly I cannot remember but I do recall steam making its way to the bedroom and dampening all my clothes which was extremely annoying since I had to pack that morning and everything got wrinkled. Room was clean with the exception of a razor that was still in the shower from a previous guest.
reviews.title: Cute, tidy, super clean, great location!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Location: excellent. Surrounded my shops and restaurants. About a 20 minute walk to the Guggenheim. We also walked to the hotel from the bus station (finding the actual building was a little tricky). The taxi rank is a 5 minute walk and taxis are available 24/7. We caught one at 5:00am to get to the airport no problem.
reviews.title: Underwhelming

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Service: you're pretty much on your own at this B&B. Upon arrival we did receive a map and all points of interest were pointed out which was useful. But there wasn't anyone at front desk for most the day if you needed anything.
reviews.title: Fantastico - right in the middle of Town

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Overall: for one night we had no complaints and enjoyed our stay. I would recommend the hotel and we thought it was good value considering it was quite inexpensive.
reviews.title: Cute budget accommdation

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great location in the Old Town. We had a nice clean room with a great view over the street. Breakfast is simple but adequate self service. We arrived on the night of Athletic Bilbao vs Real Sociedad (local derby) so unfortunately the noise of the football fans kept us awake most of the night (the windows really didn't make any difference to the noise). Also the bathroom was behind a wall but had no door so think about who you are sharing with! Other than this it was a nice place.
reviews.title: Good central location, cute and quirky

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Spent 2 nights in this B&B. The room was clean and it was situated in a charming part of town. The bed was comfortable and room was clean. A partial glass wall separates the bed from the bathroom in this small room. If someone is using the bathroom, you hear, smell and see everything they are doing, which I have a problem with. When you are asleep, you will be awakened by the light and the particularly loud toilet flushing. When you take a shower, the steam goes all over the room because there is nothing to contain it - no door on the shower either.
reviews.title: No bathroom door - unscrupulous owner

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: When we checked in, I couldn't find the confirmation of our reservation but distinctly remembered the price being very reasonable. This woman tried to pull a fast one - UNSCRUPULOUS. She told me the price was 55 euro per night per person as soon as she realized I didn't have the confirmation. She tried to get me to pay the whole bill at her rate on the spot at check in - something that is never done - but I wouldn't. I had to find an internet cafe and look for the confirmation which said the total cost was 55E per night for 2 people. I printed it out as proof.
reviews.title: Excellent Stay

reviews.text: This and the crazy bathroom situation were a complete turn off,
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If you decide to stay here, make sure you know what you are getting into and make sure you have the price and your confirmation in hand.
reviews.title: cozy little place right in the historic center of Bilbao
